gamerule.simplySnow_snowMeltChancePercen: snow's chance to melt in percentage
gamerule.simplySnow_minMeltLightLevel: minimum light level for snow to melt
gamerule.simplySnow_snowMeltChanceWarmBi: snow's chance to melt in warm biomes in percentage
gamerule.simplySnow_snowMeltChanceIndoor: snow's chance to melt indoor in percentage
gamerule.simplySnow_minMeltLightLevelInd: minimum light level for snow to melt indoor
gamerule.simplySnow_spreadDown: maximum distance for snow to spread downward
